Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    addPartForm
    This controller class allows to add InHouse and Outsourced object of type Part to the ObservableList allParts of the Inventory class.
    addProductForm
    This controller class allows to add Product object to the ObservableList allProducts of the Inventory class and to add or delete associated part(s) to a product.
    mainForm
    This controller class allows to open multiple forms and to delete parts and products from the lists.
    modifyPartForm
    This class allows to modify values of In-House and Outsourced objects of type Part and to update the ObservableList allParts in the Inventory class.
    modifyProductForm
    This class allows to modify values of Product objects and updates the ObservableList allProducts of the Inventory class and to update the ObservableList associatedParts.
